page.title: 15INDUSTRY
page.content: INDUSTRY. There is a small industrial site in the village.At the moment three firms use the area, but it is hoped that more units will be opened in the near future. Exodus Travel use a large building for the servicing of their lorries which take parties of people on safaries in Africa. A car repair workshop has been started and a workshop for servicing milking machines has also opened. In the main street Hosiers have a factory where milking machines and other farm machinery are made. Because of E.E.C. regulations on the size of milking herds part of the factory has been closed down.This firm has been in the village for more than 30 years.Four years ago it joined with Milking Machine Testers another village firm.
